description.@en: Not everyone can tie a rope so tight and firm that a mano’- war won’t drift headlong into the shoals and scatter its precious cargo.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Pilot Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, when using the Movement subtype of Rowing, you do not have to add the additional 1 Action Point cost.
